citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:28 am and
3:57 pm on 09-APR-18.
Licensee was not at home; contacted by phone, but licensee was unable to get back to the facility in a reasonable
length of time. Went back later that day and called, but licensee was still unavailable.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:28 am and
3:57 pm on 09-APR-18.
Licensee was not at home; contacted by phone, but licensee was unable to get back to the facility in a reasonable
length of time.  Went back later that day and called, but licensee was still unavailable.
